column4: hi folks, I'm a debian developer and would like to track bugs reported through ubuntu. is there any search query to find all bugs related to my packages ?
if your package is available through the repos you should be able to just search for it by name
yes I know but is there a way to get an overview over all packages like http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/pkgreport.cgi?maint=bossekr%40debian.org
oh.. I see.. no idea, sorry
